alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 03 at 1:43PM EST until March 04 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following counties, Coshocton, Guernsey, Muskingum, Noble and Tuscarawas. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
